title: Bank Earnings Come in Light, Trump Trade 2.0, Love-Hate Relationship With Tesla
itunes:title: Bank Earnings Come in Light, Trump Trade 2.0, Love-Hate Relationship With Tesla
description:
Reed Deupree, Portfolio Manager at Mendon Capital, and Arnold Kakuda, Bloomberg Intelligence Banking Analyst, breakdown bank earnings from Wells Fargo, JPMorgan and Citi. Caitlin Webber, Bloomberg Intelligence U.S. Trade Analyst, discusses the Trump administration taking another look at a TPP deal. David Welch, Bloomberg News Detroit Bureau Chief, explains why Tesla may be the most hated, and loved, stock in America. Sarah Frier, Bloomberg News Tech Reporter, talks about Facebook's future with fast-growing Instagram. We Drive to the Close with Eric Clark, Portfolio Manager at Accuvest Global Advisors.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
